attributes.action: Demand that the recent report into MEPs' expenses should be made public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 23rd April 2008 it was announced that MEPs had voted that a report into MEPs' expenses would not be published.  Inevitably this leads one to assume that there is much they do not want to be revealed.  This lack of accountability is totally unacceptable in a democratic society and the report should be a matter of public record.  Tax payers have the right to know how their money is being spent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
